sqlMap.select: SELECT u.id,u.social_name,u.social_image_url ,c.cnt AS cnt FROM (SELECT user_id, SUM(cnt) cnt FROM(SELECT a.*, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(visit_count),0) FROM visit_count WHERE encoded_key_id=a.id AND (time_period BETWEEN #startPeriod# AND #endPeriod#)) AS cnt FROM short_url a WHERE url=#url# ORDER BY cnt DESC ) count_by_user GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY cnt DESC) c ,user_info u WHERE c.user_id=u.id ORDER BY c.cnt DESC

SELECT key_id ,key_name,COALESCE(cnt,0) AS cnt FROM (SELECT 1 AS key_id,#key0# AS key_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2 AS key_id,#key1# AS key_name FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3 AS key_id,#key2# AS key_name FROM DUAL) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT social_gender AS key_name,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM user_info WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM short_url WHERE 1=1 url=#url# id=#encodedKeyId# ) GROUP BY social_gender) b USING(key_name)
SELECT operation_system as key_name,SUM(use_count) as cnt FROM user_agent_info a, short_url b WHERE a.encoded_key_id=b.id b.url=#url# b.id=#encodedKeyId# GROUP BY operation_system ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT browser as key_name,SUM(use_count) as cnt FROM user_agent_info a, short_url b WHERE a.encoded_key_id=b.id b.url=#url# b.id=#encodedKeyId# GROUP BY browser ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT time_period AS key_name,SUM(visit_count) AS cnt FROM visit_count a,short_url b WHERE time_period BETWEEN #startPeriod# AND #endPeriod# AND a.encoded_key_id=b.id b.url=#url# b.id=#encodedKeyId# GROUP BY time_period

SELECT FLOOR(time_period/100) AS key_name,SUM(visit_count) AS cnt FROM visit_count a,short_url b WHERE FLOOR(time_period/100) BETWEEN #startPeriod# AND #endPeriod# AND a.encoded_key_id=b.id b.url=#url# b.id=#encodedKeyId# GROUP BY FLOOR(time_period/100)

SELECT FLOOR(time_period/10000) AS key_name,SUM(visit_count) AS cnt FROM visit_count a,short_url b WHERE FLOOR(time_period/10000) BETWEEN #startPeriod# AND #endPeriod# AND a.encoded_key_id=b.id b.url=#url# b.id=#encodedKeyId# GROUP BY FLOOR(time_period/10000)
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(visit_count),0) FROM visit_count a, short_url b WHERE a.encoded_key_id=b.id b.url=#url# b.id=#encodedKeyId# AND time_period < #timePeriod#

SELECT rownum AS rank FROM (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS order_num,a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM ,url,u.id FROM (SELECT * FROM short_url WHERE url=#url# ORDER BY id) s,( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R,user_info u WHERE s.user_id=u.id ) a WHERE id=#userId#) a,( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R) b WHERE order_num=1
